:::Gigatron:::

::he could not beleive his eyes.  Extreme mystical things were taking 
place.  he looks to Herald::
Gigatron: Whats going on?





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Shomin95@a... wrote:
> :::Child had no time to answer gigatrons question for the second 
was just 
> about to begin. A great rock 100 feet infront of them had split 
open and a 
> dark figer stood in its center. The figer spread its dark wings and 
flew up 
> into the sky with dark clouds folowing it:::
> 
> Child: "Ah! Crulty, The worst of the seven evolvers. But look! Joy, 
wisdom 
> and Strength!!!!"
> 
> :::As he spoke Joy, Wisdom, and Strength, the thered, fourth and 
fifth had 
> just blossomed from three flowers. They stood tall and draped in 
white cloth 
> they rxploder into white green and blue light. almost imedialy 
Energy 
> blosomed in the form of a hundred doves, they flew off:::
> 
> Child: "Now it is my turn."
> 
> :::Child raised his hands and spread his wings in triumph:::
> 
> Child: "Now I must ride! The seventh evolution! Life Rides, as it 
did at the 
> creation of the planets and stars and at the univers! Life rides 
again..."
